thread.title: The PC Gamer Show: Night in the Woods, Ark role-playing adventures, and more
thread.title_full: The PC Gamer Show: Night in the Woods, Ark role-playing adventures, and more

title: The PC Gamer Show: Night in the Woods, Ark role-playing adventures, and more
text:
our Twitch channel , or after the fact at any of the links below. 
This week we'll be talking about the narrative excellence of Night in the Woods, Steven's Ark role-playing misadventures, a ton of Overwatch news, videogame movie ideas, and our usual Twitch chat Q&A! This week's topics: James oozes praise for Night in the Woods. Steven murders his lover in ARK. It's Bo with another Boverwatch Bupdate! Half-Life directed by Richard Linklater makes us millions. It's time for the weekly Twitch Q&A! Listen:
